oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Judy Baker Interviews at Corpus Christi
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording is for Hank Snow from Judy Baker and features interviews with Lefty Frizzell, Curly. Chalker, and Bob Wills. The recording is from an unidentified date. This tape is a two sided tape and this is tape 2 of 2. Tape is the twelfth of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Judy Baker; Lefty Frizzell; Curly Chalker; Hank Snow; Bob Wills;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Judy Baker continues interview with Lefty Frizzell -- (00:17) Pistol Packing Papa (Lefty Frizzell) -- (01:23) The group tries to get Curly Chalker to join in -- (01:43) Unidentified song (Curly Chalker) -- (03:01) Everyone praises Curly -- (03:28) Group talks about another song -- (03:39) Unidentified song (Curly Chalker) -- (05:22) Baker suggests that they go take pictures (05:33) Baker thanks Frizzell for doing the interview -- (06:07) Baker asks when Frizzell will be back -- (07:00) Baker tells Hank Snow that the next interview will be of Bob Wills -- (07:41) Bob Wills talking to Baker -- (08:53) Baker asks Wills to imitate what he does on the records -- (09:27) Baker asks where he is going -- (11:21) Baker interrupts to explain why the tape of Wills isn't the greatest to Snow -- (12:15) Baker introduces the next interview with Rocky, who proposed to her -- (13:11) Baker tells Snow he can erase this next track -- (14:08) Curly comes on speaking German -- (14:32) Curly sings in Japanese -- (15:21) Undistinguishable conversation -- (15:29) Curly singing in Japanese -- (16:07) Curly tells Rocky to talk -- (16:26) Rocky talks about how he met Baker -- (17:58) Curly interrupts talking about a cat -- (18:12) Rocky talks about where people are from -- (18:59) Rocky describes Baker's house -- (20:21) Undistinguishable conversation -- (20:30) Baker interrupts to address Snow about Hungarian songs from her mother -- (20:57) Baker's mom talking and someone explaining what a recorder is -- (21:33) Baker's mom singing an unidentified Hungarian song -- (21:58) Baker requests another song -- (22:10) Unidentified Hungarian song (Judy Baker's mom) -- (22:34) Undistinguishable conversation -- (22:50) The group is trying to figure out another song -- (23:44) Unidentified Hungarian song (Judy Baker's mom) -- (24:12) Baker asks if her mom knows any Slavic, Greek, or English song or singer -- (24:52) Baker addresses Snow again and talks about her mom -- (26:21) Baker talks about Rocky and her new baby -- (27:38) Baker asks Snow where he's been playing and his radio show -- (28:49) Baker signs off -- (29:07) Unidentified orchestra version of "Holy Night" -- (30:31) Unidentified orchestra version of "O Come Let Us Adore Him"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Hank; Frizzell, Lefty; Frizzell, Lefty, 1928-1975; Chalker, Curly; Wills, Bob, 1905-1975;
